title: TypeError: join() argument must be str or bytes, not 'list'

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
This is a common error under windows: https://ci.appveyor.com/api/buildjobs/0dhdwhy706yvdv03/log

```
[00:03:57] Traceback (most recent call last):
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
[00:03:57]     self.test(*self.arg)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 491, in newfunc
[00:03:57]     return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
[00:03:57]   File "c:\projects\datalad-neuroimaging\datalad_neuroimaging\extractors\tests\test_bids.py", line 108, in test_get_metadata_with_description_and_README
[00:03:57]     ds = Dataset(path).create(force=True)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\dataset.py", line 439, in apply_func
[00:03:57]     return f(**kwargs)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 470, in eval_func
[00:03:57]     return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 458, in return_func
[00:03:57]     results = list(results)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 414, in generator_func
[00:03:57]     result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 482, in _process_results
[00:03:57]     for res in results:
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\create.py", line 329, in __call__
[00:03:57]     annex_init_opts=annex_init_opts
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\repo.py", line 146, in __call__
[00:03:57]     instance = type.__call__(cls, *new_args, **new_kwargs)

[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 293, in set_default_backend
[00:03:57]     git_attributes_file = _path_(self.path, '.gitattributes')
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\utils.py", line 1269, in _path_
[00:03:57]     return opj(*map(lambda x: x.split('/'), p))
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\ntpath.py", line 113, in join
[00:03:57]     genericpath._check_arg_types('join', path, *paths)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\genericpath.py", line 143, in _check_arg_types
```
